name: Red Cedar Curio Stand
description: An elegant red cedar bookshelf from Liyue that also has room for porcelain ornaments, hence its name, the "Curio Stand."\nIt is held that the people of Liyue value both porcelain and books, and will rue the loss of both equally.\nHowever, the selection of such earthenware is also a rather particular art, and it might be best to ask a professional regarding the ideal places to put them â€” Ying'er from Scent of Spring, for instance.
